body:
Join us in October to share your ideas and concerns about wildfire preparedness in San Juan County:
Time: 5:30-7 p.m.

**Lopez Island: Oct 14** @ Lopez Fire Station, Lopez Village and on zoom: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/85383551484?pwd=TDPcUwJgrclfQFCdbBiavjsGbF9IKK.1 
Meeting ID: 853 8355 1484; Passcode: 618523 

**Orcas Island: Oct 15** @ Fire Station 21, Eastsound and on zoom: 
https://us06web.zoom.us/j/84087116076?pwd=J9fhNLIkN8ZGhUdOhcVrQcajNRdkzz.1 
Meeting ID: 840 8711 6076; Passcode: 688517 

**San Juan Island: Oct 16** @ Fire Station 31, Friday Harbor and on zoom: 
https://us06web.zoom.us/j/83842378364?pwd=4XgV1sNdAc4YUYqWqBTJbgsQG6xx1V.1 
Meeting ID: 838 4237 8364; Passcode: 309247 

Help shape the new plan, set for completion by Spring 2025, and learn more about wildfire readiness! 

For details, visit [www.sanjuanislandsCD.org/wildfire-preparedness](https://www.sanjuanislandscd.org/wildfire-preparedness)
lede: A diverse group of local emergency responders, land managers, and forestry experts from over a dozen agencies and tribes are updating the San Juan County Community Wildfire Protection Plan (CWPP), and we need your input!
title: Community Wildfire Protection Plan Community Meetings
